short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple, easy to use bookmark organizer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever tired of scrolling down you long list of bookmarks, not anymore. I love bookmarks app lets you organize your bookmarks by scroling them left, right, up and down, just like you do it for your apps in mobile phones. It simple and safe as it doesn't delete your actual bookmarks. To add or delete a bookmark you just use your browser and  then organize it in the app.
